EmailTemplate.name: Coveris PFQ_NIP Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: [Reminder] ENSI Program Focus Questionnaire for {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Please remember to complete your two ENS Pre-Program Questionnaires by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}.
The 2 pre-program questionnaires are
1. Program Focus Questionnaire (PFQ) - the PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs. Click below to access your PFQ. http://sgiz.mobi/s3/3dc3bb5dbd9b?pfq-rait&rait=NO&jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c}
Note: This link is specific to you, please don't forward to others. Please ensure Java is enabled in your web browser.
NB: If you have already started your questionnaire and have opted to 'save and continue' while in the questionnaire - it is important that you use the link that was sent to you at the time you saved your response, otherwise the above link will open a new questionnaire.
2. Negotiating and Influencing Profile (NIP) - the NIP is a profile covering 20 key competencies relating to the negotiation and influencing capabilities of individuals. A separate reminder with a link to your NIP will be emailed to you if you haven't already completed it
Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
